name: Portgas.D.Ace
text: [On Play] If your leader's types include {Whitebeard Pirates}, look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to one cost 2 character and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order and play up to one cost 2 character from your hand as rested.
